org.blockchain_innovation.factom.client.api.settings

Interface RpcSettings.Server

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    RpcSettingsImpl.ServerImpl, SpringRpcSettings.Factomd, SpringRpcSettings.Walletd
    Enclosing interface:
    RpcSettings

    public static interface RpcSettings.Server
    Represents the server settings for the factomd/walletd clients

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String getPassword()
      Gets the password for Basic Auth to the API.
      int getTimeout()
      Gets the timeout for connections to factomd/walletd.
      java.net.URL getURL()
      Gets the URL of factomd/walletd V2 API the clients needs to connect to.
      java.lang.String getUsername()
      Gets the username for Basic Auth to the API.
